Package org.webpki.cbor

Class CBOREncrypter

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.cbor.CBOREncrypter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CBORAsymKeyEncrypter, CBORSymKeyEncrypter
public abstract class CBOREncrypter extends Object
Base class for creating CBOR encryption objects. It uses COSE algorithms but relies on CEF for the packaging.

  • Method Details

    • setKeyId

      public CBOREncrypter setKeyId(byte[] keyId)
      Set encryption key Id. In the case the public key is not provided in the object, the encryption key may be tied to an identifier known by the recipient. How such an identifier is used to retrieve the proper private key is up to a convention between the parties using a specific message scheme. A keyId may be a database index, a hash of the public key, or a text string.

      For symmetric key-algorithms, a keyId or implicit key are the only ways to retrieve the proper secret key.

      Parameters:
      keyId - A key Id byte array
      Returns:
      this

    • encrypt

      public CBORMap encrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt) throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException
      Encrypt data.
      Parameters:
      dataToEncrypt - The data to encrypt
      Returns:
      CBORMap CBOR encryption object
      Throws:
